entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Some msbuild properties get corrupted before being passed to Roslyn analyzers #56180
    17.0
  • Workspace disposal during MEF shutdown may try to create more stuff and throw exceptions #56177
  • "Pull Members Up" does not correctly qualify additional generic type parameters from derived class #56174
  • Editor Tests targeting static abstract members should use at least Net 6 reference assemblies #56171
  • Adding a new method to .NET MAUI Android using Hot Reload does not produce Rude Edit dialog #56170
  • .NET 6 RC 1: changes to overload resolution? Breaks NUnit? #56167
    17.0
  • CodeGenerators? Code Fix for RS1024 is horribly wrong when multiline strings are present #56165
  • Unable to use RoslynCodeTaskFactory in MAC #56164
  • Retarget Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Debugging.Package, PooledObjects.Package, and FunctionResolver to .NET Framework 4.6.1. #56161

Closed

  • String interpolation errors when concatenating multiple string #55993
  • Method ref return a ref return, when having ref parameters #56175
  • Unexpected using clause behaviour in some cases #56172
  • Migrate the Code Analysis page to the new Project Properties UI #53567
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix crashes in some nullable error scenarios #56190
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't try to rename references in source generated files #56189
    Area-IDE
  • Fix doubleclick for Value Tracking #56188
    Area-IDE, Feature - IDE Value Tracking
  • Add External Access options for TypeScript #56187
    Area-IDE
  • Use 1ES build pools #56186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Provide real implementation for RuntimeSupportsStaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces property. #56173
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Bugs/22745 Naming style does not match for camel case and pascal case with underscores #56157
    Area-IDE
  • Use SpillSequences when appropriate instead of Sequences #56153
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56182
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56178
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Don't reference VS Shell binaries in EditorFeatures.Wpf #56045
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Options refactoring #55686
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56181
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56147
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56179
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove unused ServiceComponentOnOffOptions.DiagnosticProvider #56154
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56168
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56176
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1339847 #56155
    auto-merge
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1341341 #56169
    auto-merge
  • Wire up the feature flag properly for opening source generated files #56156
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Source generators/timing #55892
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56150
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56163
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56146
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1339667 #56152
    auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56158
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56160
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56159
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56149
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Inline Hints: Option to suppress hints where the parameter name and argument name are the same #55781
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56151
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1339482 #56144
    auto-merge
  • Remove legacy progression search #56140
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56148
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56194
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove declaration-only-compilation from CompilationTracker #56139
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56193
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56192
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56191
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • More options refactoring #56089
    Area-IDE
  • Add ISymbol.MetadataToken #55913
    Area-Compilers
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Preserve conversions on null literals before nullable type argument reinference #56022
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Add readme.md listing breaking changes doc chronologically #56019
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • Move Static Members: Existing type #56131
    Area-IDE
  • Native Int: constant folding is executed at runtime rather than compile-time if the result depends on the size of native integers #56145
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE
  • Improve the tooltip of Inheritance Margin #56026
    Area-IDE
